about.description: GrilloCOM TV is a fork of movie-web that is ensured to stay up even after the shutdown of movie-web.app. GrilloCOM TV.lol runs on a private, self-hosted VPS. This site is run without advertisements in support of free media.

q1.body: GrilloCOM TV does not host any content. When you click on something to watch, the internet is searched for the selected media (the loading screen and the 'video sources' tab display the source in use). The media is never uploaded by GrilloCOM TV; it is retrieved through this search mechanism.
q1.title: Where does the content come from?

q2.body: It is not possible to request a show or movie because GrilloCOM TV does not manage any content. All media is viewed through third-party sources.
q2.title: Where can I request a show or movie?

q3.body: Our search results are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB) and are displayed regardless of whether our sources actually have the content.
q3.title: The search results display the show or movie, why can't I play it?

q4.body: All data is synchronized with the backend, which is independently hosted. Anyone is free to use this service.
q4.title: What about my data and privacy?

q5.body: GrilloCOM TV maintains an official Twitter account (linked in the footer) and a GitHub repository for further information.
q5.title: How can I find out more?

about.title: About GrilloCOM TV

legal.disclaimerText: Please note: GrilloCOM TV does not host any files but only displays content from third-party providers. Any legal issues should be directed to the respective providers.

downloads.disclaimer: Downloads are provided directly by the content provider. GrilloCOM TV does not control the download process.
downloads.hlsDisclaimer:
Downloads are provided directly by the content provider. GrilloCOM TV does not control the download process.

Please note: you are downloading an HLS playlist. It is not recommended to download unless you are familiar with advanced streaming formats. Try different sources for various formats.

onAndroid.1: To download on Android, click the download button, then on the new page, <bold>tap and hold</bold> the video and select <bold>save</bold>.
onAndroid.title: Downloading on Android

onIos.1: To download on iOS, click the download button, then on the new page, click <bold><ios_share /></bold> and select <bold>Save to Files <ios_files /></bold>.
onIos.title: Downloading on iOS

onPc.1: On PC, click the download button, then on the new page, right-click the video and select <bold>Save video as</bold>.
onPc.title: Downloading on PC

support.title: Support
support.text: GrilloCOM TV is designed to be user-friendly. However, if you have any questions or issues, this page is here to help.

q1.body: You can join the official <0>GrilloCOM TV Discord</0> for assistance or contact us via the email provided below.
q1.title: Where can I get help?

q2.body: We maintain a <0>GitHub</0> repository where you can report issues. You may also submit a pull request to help resolve the issue.
q2.title: How can I report a bug or issue?

jip.title: Jip
jip.text: GrilloCOM TV was developed primarily by a single developer.

q1.body: You can join the official <0>GrilloCOM TV Discord</0> for assistance or contact us via the email provided below.
q1.title: Where can I get help?

q2.body: We maintain a <0>GitHub</0> repository where you can report issues. You may also submit a pull request to help resolve the issue.
q2.title: How can I report a bug or issue?

dmca.text: This is GrilloCOM TV's DMCA contact page. If you believe your copyrighted work has been used without authorization, please send a detailed DMCA notice to: <bold>{{dmca}}</bold>. Include a description of the copyrighted material, your contact details, and a statement of good faith. We are committed to addressing these matters promptly.
dmca.title: DMCA Notice

loadingUserError.textWithReset: Failed to load your profile from the custom server. Would you like to reset to the default server?

preferences.languageDescription: Language applied to the entire application. Currently, English is the primary language available.
preferences.thumbnailDescription: Videos often lack thumbnails. Enabling this setting will generate them on the fly, though it may affect video performance.
preferences.autoplayDescription: Automatically play the next episode in a series after the current one ends. This feature is available with the browser extension, a custom proxy, or the default setup if permitted by the host.
preferences.sourceOrderDescription: Drag and drop to reorder sources. This determines the order in which sources are checked for the media you are trying to watch. If a source appears greyed out, it is not available on your device.
preferences.title: Preferences
